case.title: Read if u want lots of gifts cash and a sincere n honest relationship (central london)
case.text:
A genuine n honest guy here who will be there for u. They say friend in need is friend indeed if you have any problems or require any help emotional financial or regarding accommodation in or around london then i will help you a lot ....in exchange i would want your company and quality time ...this is genuine add so i please reply with ur pic
Please do not contact me for any professional services .
Many thanks
